alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 1:43PM CDT until August 05 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Saline County in central Arkansas... West central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 143 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Williams Junction, or 14 miles northeast of Hot Springs Village, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chenal Valley... Avilla... Ferndale... Paron... Congo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
